organic: Ɛho nhia sɛ yɛyɛ biribiara, wo nnɔbae no te apɔw
chemical: Ɛho nhia sɛ yɛyɛ biribiara, wo nnɔbae no te apɔw
Ɛfata sɛ wokɔ so yɛ nea woreyɛ no besi saa bere yi

causes: Yare no fi mmoawammoawa Puccinia Sorghi. Mmoawammoawa yi tumi de mframa ne osu fa wɔn kɔ akyirikyiri. Wodi nkuraase a wɔtow gu nnua so no ho dwuma.

organic: Saa bere yi, ayaresa foforo biara nni hɔ a wɔde sa yare yi. Yɛtaa yɛ nsakrae wɔ yɛn nhyehyɛe mu, na yɛsan kɔhwehwɛ mu akyiri yi anaa yɛfa mmoa kratafa no so ne yɛn di nkitaho.
chemical: Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ yiye a, susuw akwan horow a wobetumi afa so asiw ano ne nnuru a wɔde siw ano ho
Sɛ wɔde nnuru a wɔde kum nkosua gu nnua ahorow a wɔn ho yɛ hu so a, ebetumi aboa
Sɛ ewim tebea no nti, sɛ ntontom no trɛw ntɛmntɛm a, fa ntini mu nnuru a wɔde kum nkekae no di dwuma wɔ bere a edi kan wɔ osutɔbere mu
Wɔwɔ nnuru pii a wɔde kum nkwammoaa a wɔde ko tia awuduru, wobetumi de nnuru a wɔde di dwuma de adi yare no so.
Nhwɛso bi ne sɛ, sɛ wɔtew no a, wobetumi ahwiee mancozeb mu nsu a ɛboro gram 2.5/l no agu no so ntɛm ara, na wɔasan de aba no bi adi dwuma wɔ nnafua 10 ntam kosi sɛ afifide no bɛgu.

preventive_measures: Nnua ahorow a enni ntini a ɛwɔ hɔ
Monyɛ ntɛm mfa nsiesie mo ho mma nyarewa no
fa nnua ahorow a wɔtew bere tiaa mu a enyin ntɛm
Monitor crop regularly for signs of the disease, even more so during overcast weather
Hwɛ sɛ yare no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne bi wɔ afuw no mu bere nyinaa, titiriw bere a ewim ayɛ kusuu no
Sɛ nnɔbae a wɔatwa no nyɛ yiye a, ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwɛ sɛ yɛbɛhwɛ sɛ nnɔbae no bɛsesa.

organic: Saa bere yi, ayaresa foforo biara nni hɔ a wɔde sa yare yi. Yɛtaa yɛ nsakrae wɔ yɛn nhyehyɛe mu, na yɛsan kɔhwehwɛ mu akyiri yi anaa yɛfa mmoa kratafa no so ne yɛn di nkitaho.
